title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Microlearning Course for Enhancing Aesthetic Sensibility for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to systematically recognize aesthetic elements in work environments, achieving at least 80% formative assessment attainment.
Learners can perform creative content production processes reflecting aesthetic sensibility in language expression at least three times.
Learners achieve an interaction score of at least 4.0 when sharing aesthetic experiences through peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
